      public static String getDefaultBrowser()
      It returns the default browser name. It works on windows only.
      Returns:

      public static void addToClipbaord(String com)
      It adds the given text to clipboard
      Parameters:
      com - Text that is to be added to clipboard

    • taskManager

      public static void taskManager() throws FileMissingException
      It opens Windows task manager. It works on windows only.
      Throws:
      FileMissingException

    • beep

      public static void beep()
      It produces an beep sound

    • printError

      public static void printError(String com)
      It prints text as an error. It works equivalent to System.err.println
      Parameters:
      com - Text to be printed

    • exit

      public static void exit()
      It exits the program

      public static void freeze(int data)
      It freezes the program for the given time in milliseconds
      Parameters:
      data - time to freeze the thread for a given time in milliseconds

      public static void open(String data)
      It opens a file
      Parameters:

    • sleep

      public static void sleep(int data) throws FailedToFreezeException
      It freezes the program for the given time in milliseconds
      Parameters:
      data - time to freeze the thread for a given time in seconds
      Throws:
      FailedToFreezeException

    • terminal

      public static void terminal()
      It opens terminal, cmd.exe in windows. It works on windows only.

    • isConnected

      public static boolean isConnected()
      Checks if the system is connected to Internet or not. The time for checking depends on the internet speed. If the computer is connected to WiFi or Ethernet but no internet is accessed then the control will not return back from this method
      Returns:
      true if the computer is connected to internet

    • getIP

      public static String getIP(String url)
      It returns IP address of a given URL
      Parameters:
      url - server URL of which IP address is to be found
      Returns:
      IP address of the given URl

    • ping

      public static int[] ping(String server)
      It tests the ping to a server and returns the data in the following format [average, minimum, maximum, packets sent in bytes]. It works on Windows OS only
      Parameters:
      server - Server URL
      Returns:
      ping details in format [average, minimum, maximum, packets sent in bytes]

    • aGET

      public static void aGET(String url) throws MalformedURLException
      Download the file in the given URL. The saved file name is same as the file name in server
      Parameters:
      url - URL to a file on a server
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException

    • aGET

      public static void aGET(String url, String file, boolean isAddress) throws MalformedURLException
      Download the file in the given URL and save it the given URL. The value in file is regarded as the location of file where it is saved when isAddress is false else the file is regarded as the file location including file name. If file is the location of file then the saved file name is set to the file name saved in the server.
      Parameters:
      url - URL to a file on a server
      file - File location / address using which the file is saved
      isAddress - true if the given file location contains file address
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException

    • aGet

      public static void aGet(URL website, String file) throws MalformedURLException
      Download the file in the given URL and save it the given URL. The value in file is regarded as the location of file where it is saved when isAddress is false else the file is regarded as the file location including file name. If file is the location of file then the saved file name is set to the file name saved in the server.
      Parameters:
      website - URL to a file on a server
      file - File address with file name using which the file is saved
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException
